name: Kings Of Hell
description:
Allow me to present to you, Kings of Hell!

A new game I am working on; a 3D Beat Em Up, Multiplayer Brawler in the vein of beat em ups of the early 2000's!

Join the StrawberryOctopus Productions discord at:
https://discord.gg/kZuk4E3

You can support the development of this project on Patreon in the Link Listed Below!
https://www.patreon.com/strawberryoctii
